> What happened to the scrollable forum signatures?

I am glad they are gone for a variety of reasons, the most obvious is they add extra length to posts.

Sadly, we have some forum members who would want to see how long they could make their signatures. Signatures are supposed to take up a very small amount of "visual real estate" essentially enough to tell the person viewing it a little more about you.

[A few posts back in this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111158-ask-the-mods-questions-about-the-forums/&do=findComment&comment=4005142), I discuss setting up a status update and using it as a static page that you could paste the link to it in your signature. The status update can be updated can be updated just as any other forum post can be updated.

> > > On 7/15/2021 at 9:04 AM, adsii1970 said: > > > Yes, I agree. Long signatures can be annoying. > > > > > However, I have been thinking of this for a while. One of the things our forum software is missing is a fully customizable "about me" page. In my mind's eye, it is where folks could share more about themselves, within the scope of the forum guidelines, but without bogging down the signature area. > > > > > One of the best ways to create a "profile page" where folks can create a brag page. Here's how you could do it: > > > > > 1. Go to your profile page and activate status updates. > > > > Hide contents > > > [![SbwBLr0.png](https://i.imgur.com/SbwBLr0.png)](https://i.imgur.com/SbwBLr0.png "Enlarge image") > > > > > > > > > > [![RQzR0xR.png](https://i.imgur.com/RQzR0xR.png)](https://i.imgur.com/RQzR0xR.png "Enlarge image") > > > > 2. Go to the status update you want to use as a static page, sorta like an extension of your profile page or Facebook "about me" section. Click on the date of the status update. > > > > Hide contents > > > [![wwbW9CE.png](https://i.imgur.com/wwbW9CE.png)](https://i.imgur.com/wwbW9CE.png "Enlarge image") > > > > **3. The forum software will now open the status update as a single page with its own URL:** > > > > Hide contents > > > [![5j2AOBP.png](https://i.imgur.com/5j2AOBP.png)](https://i.imgur.com/5j2AOBP.png "Enlarge image") > > > > You can now use that URL in any part of the forum (for example, as a link in your signature), and any other place externally, that allows for URLS to be entered. It will always direct to the singe status update and not to your activity feed. > > > > > I hope this helps some of you who want to have the "brag page" in the signatures and just cannot confine it to the abbreviated version. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") > I'll have to do this some time!
